# THE WORLD'S GREATEST MOTORCYCLE ADVENTURES

Combining the thrill of adventure motorcycling with the support of experienced
backup teams, our expeditions venture off the beaten track in far-flung
destinations.

Contact Us __

 __Play Video

  *

### Welcome To Ride Expeditions

## WORLD CLASS MOTORCYCLE ADVENTURES SINCE 2012

We mix pure adventure with unique, high quality accommodation & always aim to
strike a perfect balance between cultural experiences, local knowledge & epic
riding with unparalleled safety & a professional operation.

 _ **These are not your average motorcycle tours: These are motorcycle
adventures at their finest!**_

  * First response medic on every tour
  * Fully insured
  * Multiple package options
  * Your money is safe in trust

  * Adventure focused
  * British company
  * Socially responsible
  * Group discounts

About Us __

VIEW ALL TRIPS __

  *  __
  *  __
  *  __
  *  __
  *  __

**GREG - HU**

Victoria Falls to Cape Town - Africa 2023

An epic adventure that will be remembered forever. Recently finished the Vic
Falls to Cape Town tour and words can't describe the amazing experience. Henk
and the crew made sure we feel at home from day one. No requests were
forgotten...

  *  __
  *  __
  *  __
  *  __
  *  __

**IAN - UK**

Himalayan Heights - India 2023

The recent 13 day tour of the Himalayas (7th-19th August) was 5* from start to
finish. The team leader Danie and all the back-up riders, guides / mechanics
left nothing to chance: every little thing was in place. Hotels, food, bikes -
all were perfect!

  *  __
  *  __
  *  __
  *  __
  *  __

**NICK - NZ**

Tribal Trails - Vietnam 2023

I went on the Tribal Trails Vietnam at the beginning of October. This was the
second tour with Ride Expeditions having ridden Cambodia with them in 2018.
Let me say straight off the bat Vietnam did not disappoint, and way exceeded
my expectations both the riding, scenery and fun factor...

  *  __
  *  __
  *  __
  *  __
  *  __

**JAMES - USA**

Cape Town to Victoria Falls - Africa 2023

Pretty simple! If motorcycling South Africa is on your bucket list, do
yourself a favour and go with Ride Expeditions. Henk and Megan are the
greatest! Lodgings, food, bikes, were first class...

  *  __
  *  __
  *  __
  *  __
  *  __

**KIMBERLEY - USA**

Cape Crusader - South Africa 2023

Ride Expeditions is a 5 star tour company all the way through! Their Cape
Crusader tour of South Africa will live with me forever. I am already dreaming
of booking another tour, especially with my new riding friends!

  *  __
  *  __
  *  __
  *  __
  *  __

**NATHAN - UK**

Tumble in the Jungle - Cambodia 2022

Tumble in the Jungle by Ride Expeditions is an incredible Dirt Bike adventure
through Cambodia. Be prepared to tackle rocks, ruts, deep sand, climbs and
falls across broken roads and jungle trails. Swim in lakes, get massaged by
waterfalls and be cheered on by groups of locals...

  *  __
  *  __
  *  __
  *  __
  *  __

**CONRAD - USA**

Colombian Trailblazer - Colombia 2022

Ride expeditions is incredibly professional. The trip to Colombia was by far
the best vacation of my life (so far). Toby is an excellent tour guide and
makes the whole process very simple for the riders. For what you get the price
value is unbelievable, I don't know how they even make money off of this. The
riding is also very good and they have a good system to allow riders of
varying skill levels have fun riding together...

View More __

Since we started touring in 2012, we've never had a single bad review... And
we intend to keep it that way!

### Package Options

## Your Adventure, Your Way

###  ADVENTURE

£

  * Self-guided 

  * Essential support only 

  * __ No meals included 

  * First tank of fuel only 

  * Generally 2-3* accommodation 

  * Entrance fees excluded 

  * These packages are generally the most affordable tour packages, with the bells and whistles stripped back, leaving you with the essentials provided and the flexibility to tour in your own way. 

VIEW TRIPS

###  STANDARD

££

  * Guided 

  * Limited support team 

  * __ Some meals excluded 

  * Fuel inclusions vary from tour to tour 

  * Generally 2-4* accommodation 

  * Entrance fees excluded 

VIEW TRIPS

###  PREMIUM

£££

  * Guided 

  * Full support team 

  * __ Meals included 

  * All fuel included 

  * Generally 3-5* accommodation 

  * Entrance fees included 

VIEW TRIPS

## DISCUSS YOUR NEXT ADVENTURE WITH OUR FRIENDLY TEAM

We're here to help you choose the perfect adventure and are always happy to
chat. Should you want to discuss a particular trip with one of our experienced
tour leaders, just say the word and we'll make it happen.

Contact Us __

## COVID-19 NOTIFICATION

For  **all**  tours cancelled by Ride Expeditions, riders can choose to
receive a  **100%  refund** or to transfer all monies paid to any future tour.

Full details can be found in our  **terms& conditions.**

Ride Expeditions Ltd is a company committed to customer satisfaction and
consumer financial protection. At no extra cost to you, and in accordance with
‘The Package Travel and Linked Travel Arrangements Regulations 2018’,  **all
passengers booking with Ride Expeditions Ltd are fully insured for the initial
deposit, and subsequently the balance of monies paid**  as detailed in your
booking confirmation form. The policy also includes repatriation if required,
arising from the cancellation or curtailment of your travel arrangements due
to the insolvency of Ride Expeditions Ltd. This insurance has been arranged by
Towergate Travel through  **Zurich Insurance PLC**.

 **Book your next tour with confidence with Ride Expeditions.**

Privacy & Cookies Policy

#### Privacy Overview

This website uses cookies to improve your experience while you navigate
through the website. Out of these, the cookies that are categorized as
necessary are stored on your browser as they are essential for the working of
basic functionalities of the website. We also use third-party cookies that
help us analyze and understand how you use this website. These cookies will be
stored in your browser only with your consent. You also have the option to
opt-out of these cookies. But opting out of some of these cookies may affect
your browsing experience.

Necessary

Necessary

Always Enabled

Necessary cookies are absolutely essential for the website to function
properly. This category only includes cookies that ensures basic
functionalities and security features of the website. These cookies do not
store any personal information.

Non-necessary

Non-necessary

Any cookies that may not be particularly necessary for the website to function
and is used specifically to collect user personal data via analytics, ads,
other embedded contents are termed as non-necessary cookies. It is mandatory
to procure user consent prior to running these cookies on your website.
